item.title: Elsie F.'s Review of Foundry on Elm - Somerville (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Came here after dinner nearby in Davis Sq on a Friday night and enjoyed drinks with friends. We started off at the bar but ended up getting a table towards the back. The seating was comfortable for…

item.description: Ordered an amazing nutella french toast, quite possibly one of the most amazing things I've ever eaten. I wouldn't be surprised if that's the most popular item on the menu. It was very filling, I…

item.title: George H.'s Review of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Waltham (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Had the opportunity to eat here a few times, they just opened up. Obviously the food is great, same as any other Chipotle. But the staff certainly has to get over the learning curve. Ordered a…

item.title: George H.'s Review of Asia Wok - Waltham (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Decent Chinese food for a reasonable price.
I ordered lo mein, chicken fingers, and fried rice for a total of $24 including tax, tip, and delivery. The lo mein was amazing, very well done. The…

item.title: mike c.'s Review of Big Boss Pantry - Quincy (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: this place deserves no stars. the rice roll that i got was bland and hard to chew. it's like it's been sitting there for a couple nights.

item.description: I've been coming to Mr Sushi for over a year now and had most of the items on the menu. Multiple people who I've brought for the first time have enjoyed it and said that it is one of the best sushi…

item.description: My wife and I love this place. We go once a month and enjoy it everytime. The food is great and reasonably priced. My favorite is the braised short ribs and my wife loves the ribeye. The best part of…

item.title: Justin S.'s Review of Boston Sports Club - Boston (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Where to start.... The BSC at Downtown Crossing is the Headquarters facility. With that being said you would expect that the place was better take care of. There always seems to be broken equipment…

item.title: Julia V.'s Review of Beacon Hill Pub - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Came here after the Red Sox parade- bar was packed but the bartender was on top of his shit! Good beer selection and drinks are not crazy expensive.

item.title: Lynn J.'s Review of Aquitaine - Boston (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
frugal, fast, friendly and flavorful... only £9.95 for an all inclusive brunch every Saturday and Sunday in South End Boston!
brunch includes all of the following: homemade cinnamon roll, coffee,…

item.title: Dennis M.'s Review of North Hill - Needham (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: So many pictures not many reviews so I thought I would write one my mom is here for about 2yrs it very nice the staff is great caring considerate of everyone the food is good they are putting new…

item.description: as a long time customer of this long standing restaurant, i was completely appoled with my experience last night!!! i was greeted at the dirty bar by a snotty bartender!!! the cocktail list was…

item.title: Matthew V.'s Review of Olympia Moving & Storage - Watertown (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I tell you, this is the best company to go with. We had a three Romanian gentlemen come to do the impossible. Move a large piano to the second floor through the smallest staircase in the world.…

item.title: P D.'s Review of Toro - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Every time i visit Boston, i have to go to this restaurant - i just love the ambience, the creative and delicious tapas and the great Spanish wines. You must check it out but be prepared to wait...

item.title: Sophea C.'s Review of The Games People Play - Cambridge (1/5) on Yelp
item.description:
I've been trying to like this place for the past eight years, but every time we've gone there the staff have been rude and unwelcoming.

item.title: ed G.'s Review of West Broadway Gulf - Boston (1/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Watch out for them trying to overcharge you.
I Tried to buy an item. It rang up 2 dollars more than posted price. When I confronted clerk they would not honor the posted price.
They have no honor!

item.description: AWESOME SERVICE!!! First time user of Flight Car - Boston and was very impressed with this growing company, everyone was very professional and helpful. As instructed, soon as I landed back in Boston…

item.title: Alex C.'s Review of The Next Page Cafe - Weymouth (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Since the Yard Rock closed, this place is the only last true stronghold of south shore blues. The beers flow cheap, the floor rocks, and the bands are consistent. Any questions?

item.title: Julie G.'s Review of Kashmir Indian Restaurant - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Excellent food, buffet, try the mango smoothie (it's worth $5)! Enjoy :)

item.title: Jon W.'s Review of Dwelltime - Cambridge (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Horrible service and will never come back. I defiantly will spread the word not to come to this place.

item.title: Leah V.'s Review of Yoki Japanese Restaurant & Bar - Medford (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I went to dinner with my husband over the weekend, and we love it. The food was great, and our waitress, Nina, was amazing. She know the menu like the back of her hand, very nice and friendly. The…

item.title: Sara S.'s Review of Grafton Street - Cambridge (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
When we moved here from Chicago, we really missed our favorite neighborhood pubs. We have found our answer in the dark wood, and awesome ambiance of the Grafton street pub and grill.
Awesome…

item.title: Ihab A.'s Review of Myers + Chang - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Probably one of the best Asian infusion restaurants I have been to in a long time! I would recommend Myer and Chang to anyone looking for a great meal. Dinner is amazing here as well as the brunch…

item.title: James C.'s Review of Island Creek Oyster Bar - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Great food here. On a Tuesday we decided to go Island Creek Oyster Bar. We came at 6pm because its almost always busy here. By 7oclock on a TUESDAY this place was packed. I can easily tell you why…

item.title: Jer S.'s Review of Giorgio's - Norwood (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Jack has really hit it with this one! I love pizza. It's just hard to find good Italian pizza but here it is! Jack makes an excellent pie that's fresh, great sauce, and tasty ingredients! Don't…

item.title: Jake S.'s Review of Rod Dee Thai Cuisine - Cambridge (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Average. Decent food. Great value for buck. Authentic.
And portions are good; but I understand why they are so cheap - meat/protein to starch/rice/noodle ratio is quite low.
But solid all around…

item.title: Mike D.'s Review of Anthem Kitchen and Bar - Boston (2/5) on Yelp
item.description: A bit underwhelming but the space is cool. I guess when you visit a touristy spot, you can't always expect the best. This place sits right on Faneuil hall and the outdoor seating puts you in a prime…

item.title: James C.'s Review of The Abbey - Brookline (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Well the wait on weekends is incredibly long as they don't take reservations and there is an incredible lack of seats/tables. So we decided to go on a weeknight where we could just walk in and get a…

item.title: Emilia C.'s Review of Aikia Steak House - Swampscott (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Fucking restaurant ,work from 12 am to 4 :46 pm only ten dollar,pick up by van at morning late for half hour. Fucking owner ,ask two girls go home by train which comes in one hour in the freezing…

item.title: Merith T.'s Review of Emma's Breakfast - Quincy (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Quaint place with a waiting line to get in so you know the food is good. However, sadly disappointed with the banana walnut pancakes. While they were golden fluffy warm discs stacked on a cream…

item.title: Sarah B.'s Review of Sav-Mor Liquors - Somerville (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
I know this sounds stupid, but I've never checked to see if I actually save money at Sav-Mor. The prices seem reasonable and they have a good selection, so I've never been disappointed.

item.title: Michael R.'s Review of Zing Wingz - Somerville (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: I live down the street and Zing Wingz had become a go to. Their pizza is above average. It is standard not too thin, not too thick style. The toppings are an appropriate in amount and consistency…

item.title: Diana L.'s Review of Dorado Tacos & Cemitas - Brookline (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
1) I love this place!

item.title: James C.'s Review of Rod Dee - Brookline (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: One of my favorite Thai places. I love that their portions are huge and well priced. The food is always flavorful. The Kai Himmapan is a sweet/salty/savory fried chicken dish with pinapples and…

item.title: Elizabeth W.'s Review of Grafton Street - Cambridge (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: A few friends and I went to Grafton Street today for brunch. We shared a pitcher of the strawberry Germaine brunch cocktail, which was refreshing and not too sweet. I got the avocado benedict, which…

item.title: Caroline R.'s Review of Warehouse Bar & Grille - Boston (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I went here after work for a couple of drinks with friends and the place was packed around 6:30 PM. Warehouse has a cool vibe and even though there are a ton of tvs there playing the sports games, it…

item.title: Ravit R.'s Review of The Best Little Restaurant - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place lives up to its name, and then some. Over the years, it's become our go-to spot in Chinatown, and it always delivers. I'm a vegetarian, and I have yet to be disappointed by the veg fare:…

item.title: Cesar B.'s Review of Julio's Barbershop - Boston (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Went to Julio's this past weekend to get a fade and was delightfully pleased I did. I can honestly say that I got the best $17 fade I've ever gotten. The barbers are definitely up to par. I was…

item.title: Ashley A.'s Review of Union Oyster House - Boston (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Union Oyster House is always a good place to bring out-of-towners when they come to visit. The food great, and I'm rarely disappointed. They are quite pricey, but they can afford to be, seeing as they…

item.title: James B.'s Review of Plymouth Rock Assurance Corporation - Boston (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: They are not fast responding to emails. They send bills and policy changes in locked pdf files that you cannot save unlocked, thus you have to remember the security code months, years later when…

item.title: Dorothy C.'s Review of Frank's Steakhouse - Cambridge (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Wow, pretty good! I wasn't sure what to expect, based on the bi-modal reviews, but I followed people's advice, and it was a nice experience I'd want to repeat. These were the tips we found helpful:-…
